LengthOfStay Eubin Park & Raphaël Adda 2021-12-07 Chapter 1 Introduction We will analyze and visualize link between Length of Stay in the critical care units of the Beth Israel Deaconess Medical Center between 2001 and 2012 and other medical data.

Chapter 2 Data sources https://physionet.org/content/mimiciii-demo/1.4/ https://microsoft.github.io/r-server-hospital-length-of-stay/input_data.html: data description link https://github.com/microsoft/r-server-hospital-length-of-stay/blob/master/Data/LengthOfStay.csv

Chapter 3 Data transformation The original data provided by the critical care units of the Beth Israel Deaconess Medical Center between 2001 and 2012 are available on the following link https://physionet.org/content/mimiciii-demo/1.4/ as SQL table. Microsoft provides a cleaned csv file on its official github repository: https://github.com/microsoft/r-server-hospital-length-of-stay. Our csv is available in the file “Data” and it is named: “LengthOfStay.csv”.
Chapter 4 Missing values Our dataset does not contain any missing values.
Chapter 6 Interactive component Proportion of patients in terms of Length of Stay for each number of previous visits in this hospital
